page.title: 02Predannack Airfield
page.content: Predannack airfield is owned by RNAS Culdrose and is used as a helicopter base to train pilots.It was built and used during the Second World War.It was here in 1950 that Dr.Barnes Wallace,who invented the bouncing bomb,experimented with swept wing aircraft. The original headquarters of RAF Predannack,built in 1940,is now private property and is called Mill View.After the war it was used as a Cheshire home and the present bungalow was built at this time.Later a farmer bought it to rear young animals, using the bungalow as his home.After that it was sold again and turned into a holiday home for the mentally and physically handicapped and it is still being used as this.
